title: Samsung 4K Smart Refrigerator with WiFi
description: Energy-efficient smart refrigerator with 4K display, WiFi connectivity, and voice control. Features include smart cooling technology, spacious interior, and mobile app integration for remote monitoring.

title: LG InstaView Door-in-Door Refrigerator
description: Innovative refrigerator with InstaView technology - knock twice to see inside without opening the door. Door-in-Door design provides easy access to frequently used items.

title: Silk Floral Print Nightgown
description: Luxurious silk nightgown with delicate floral print. Features include adjustable shoulder straps, knee-length design, and ultra-soft fabric for comfortable sleep.

title: Cotton Lace Nightgown Set
description: Comfortable cotton nightgown with elegant lace trim. Set includes matching robe. Perfect for lounging and sleeping with breathable cotton fabric.

title: High-Waisted Yoga Leggings
description: Premium yoga leggings with high-waisted design for maximum comfort and support. Made from moisture-wicking fabric with four-way stretch technology.

title: Athletic Performance Leggings
description: Professional-grade athletic leggings designed for intense workouts. Features compression technology, side pockets, and reflective details for night running.

title: Merino Wool Crew Socks - Short
description: Premium merino wool short socks with moisture-wicking properties. Perfect for everyday wear with cushioned sole and seamless toe construction.

title: Compression Athletic Socks - Long
description: Long compression socks designed for athletes and active individuals. Provides graduated compression for improved circulation and reduced fatigue.

title: Nike Air Max Running Shoes
description: Classic Nike Air Max running shoes with visible air cushioning. Features breathable mesh upper, durable rubber outsole, and iconic design.

title: Women's Leather Fashion Shoes
description: Elegant women's leather shoes perfect for professional and casual wear. Features comfortable heel height, premium leather construction, and versatile design.

title: Adidas Ultraboost Running Shoes
description: Premium Adidas Ultraboost running shoes with responsive Boost midsole technology. Features Primeknit upper for adaptive fit and Continental rubber outsole.

title: Waterproof Hiking Boots
description: Durable waterproof hiking boots with ankle support and aggressive tread pattern. Perfect for outdoor adventures with breathable membrane and reinforced toe cap.

title: Classic Leather Work Boots
description: Heavy-duty leather work boots with steel toe protection and slip-resistant sole. Built for durability and comfort in demanding work environments.

title: Premium Cotton Dress Shirt
description: High-quality cotton dress shirt with classic fit and professional appearance. Features mother-of-pearl buttons, French seams, and wrinkle-resistant fabric.

title: Casual Polo Shirt
description: Classic polo shirt made from soft cotton blend. Perfect for casual and semi-formal occasions with ribbed collar and cuffs, two-button placket.

title: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation
description: Latest Apple AirPods Pro with adaptive transparency, personalized spatial audio, and up to 2x more active noise cancellation. Includes MagSafe charging case.

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro
description: Premium wireless earbuds with intelligent active noise cancellation and 360 audio. Features comfortable fit, long battery life, and seamless device switching.

title: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: Latest iPhone with A17 Pro chip, titanium design, and pro camera system. Features 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, 5G connectivity, and iOS 17.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Flagship Samsung smartphone with S Pen, 200MP camera, and AI-powered features. Includes 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display and 5000mAh battery.

title: LG OLED 77" 4K Smart TV
description: Premium 77-inch OLED TV with perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and vibrant colors. Features webOS smart platform, Dolby Vision IQ, and gaming-optimized display.

title: Samsung Neo QLED 65" 8K Smart TV
description: Cutting-edge 65-inch 8K QLED TV with Quantum HDR and AI upscaling. Features Tizen OS, voice control, and ultra-slim design with premium materials.
